name: HOTSHOT (itch)
description:
Before i say anything... Billy bob ()

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move, Press P to Buy 15 ammo for $0.25 dollars, and O to buy a medkit with 5 health for 1 dollar,The hot dies in the cold and the cold dies in the hot use it to your advantage. 1 to use pistol and 2 to use Uzi. If you run out of ammo You Use a knife. Can you beat wave 10? if so try the impossible challenge, Beat wave 1-10 with the knife(drain ammo) and no buying med kits. Oh yeah don't worry you are a super human who can withstand any temperature

Made for the VimJam 3 Game jam

Everything was made by me
